text: Thomas Funck (26 October 1919, Linköping, Östergötland, Sweden – 30 December 2010) was a Swedish writer of children's literature. He is known for his stories about Charlie Strap and Froggy Ball. ==Filmography== * Charlie Strapp Froggy Ball And Their Friends (film) (, 1956, voice) * Charlie Strapp and Froggy Ball Saves The Chicken (1987 Short Films) (, 1987, voice) * Charlie Strapp and Froggy Ball Flying High (1991 The Movie) (, 1991, voice) Category:1919 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Swedish writers
title: Thomas Funck
